english.segment1: I am the cunning prince of thieves. I am the nagging bite of teeth. I am the tightest skirt unraveling. And the kiss upon you cheek.
english.segment2: Most lies, can put a man in a woman's burning fuse. Closed eyes, can save a man from a woman's taste of fruit. As long as you refuse to believe in the power, of cold showers, You'll continue to excuse the receiving end of cowards.
english.segment3: I swear to the few who drowned in doubt. And I've come here to warn you, For the ghost can see you now.
english.segment4: Chemicals and cannibals, This kiss becomes medical, yeah. Chemicals and cannibals, Well this kiss becomes medical, yeah.
english.segment5: Fire up the engines. We're getting lost in her hair. I can smell the sulfur burning sweet sex in the air. Adrenaline and hormones become the pendulum inside your bones.
